text: Chris Carr or Christopher Carr may refer to: * Chris Carr (Medal of Honor) (1914â€“1970), American soldier and Medal of Honor recipient * Chris Carr (motorcyclist) (born 1967), American motorcycle racer, land speed record holder * Chris Carr (basketball) (born 1974), American basketball player * Chris Carr (American football) (born 1983), American football player * Chris Carr (musician) (born 1986), bassist for Blockades * Christopher M. title: Chris Carr
